text: Ndi pamene Mau athu awerengedwa kwa iwo momveka, anthu amene salabadira zakukumana nafe amanena kuti, “Bweretsa Buku la Korani losiyana ndi ili kapena ulisinthe.” Nena, “Siudindo wanga kusintha Buku ili mwa chifuniro changa. Ndithudi ine ndimangotsatira zokhazo zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa ine. Ndithudi ine ndimaopa chilango cha tsiku lalikulu ngati nditanyoza Ambuye wanga.”
